description: Library used in the Digital Office project.
releaseNotes:
1.1.55 - renamed HidePasswordHelper to PasswordHider, added TextTemplateParser.

      Previous versions:
      1.1.54 - Add ExtendedEditValidator, KeywordAttribute, KeywordCollecor, renamed const EditDepartmentUsers to AddRemoveDepartmentData.
      1.1.53 - Update to .Net 6.
      1.1.52 - Removed broker classes.
      1.1.51 - Removed cache classes.
      1.1.50 - Add CacheNotebook.
      1.1.49 - Add Director Department rights to Constants and add HidePassword method
      1.1.48 - Remove AuthoInject RedisHelper, add async to AccessValidator and BaseEditRequestValidator
      1.1.47 - Added ImageFormats class, ImageContentValidator, ImageExtensionValidator; edited IBaseDataProvider (added Task SaveAsync()).
      1.1.46 - Added RedisHelper, ResponseCreator, fixed BaseEditRequestValidator.
      1.1.45 - Update BaseEditRequestValidator.
      1.1.44 - Fix redis extensions.
      1.1.43 - Updated IEnumerableExtension. BaseFindRequest renamed to BaseFindFilter and moved to request namespace.
      1.1.42 - Added IEnumerableExtension. Added nuget StackExchange.Redis ver 2.2.50.
      1.1.41 - Added BaseFindRequestValidator, IBaseFindRequestValidator, add folder models in validators and BaseFindValidator, add cache in Constants. Fixed AccessValidator and IAccessValidator.
      1.1.40 - Fixed methods HasRights of AccessValidator.
      1.1.39 - Added BaseEditRequestValidator
      1.1.38 - Add History rights to Constants.
      1.1.37 - Remove BadRequest and Conflict from OperationResultStatusType.
      1.1.36 - Update AccessValidator.
      1.1.35 - Add ValidateCustom Extension. Add BadRequest to OperationResultStatusType.
      1.1.34 - Add 'AddEditRemoveTime' constant for Rights.
      1.1.33 - Add FindParseEntitiesConsumer, IFindParseEntitiesRequest/response. Add attribute ParseEntityAttribute and IgnoreParseAttribute.
      1.1.32 - Fixed Status type of FindResultResponse and OperationResultResponse
      1.1.31 - Added FindResultResponse, updated status property of OperationResultResponse
      1.1.30 - Updated status property of OperationResultResponse
      1.1.29 - Added Conflict to OperationResultResponse
      1.1.28 - Added GetEnvironmentVariableHelper, InternelServerException. Updated ConstStrings. Change MassTransit RequestClients default timeout to RequestTimeout.Default.
      1.1.27 - Reworked AutoInjectRequest attribute
      1.1.26 - Add fluent validation packet and fix ExceptionHandler.
      1.1.25 - Add complex response model.
      1.1.24 - Add Rights properties to constants.
      1.1.23 - Version just for test.
      1.1.22 - Change MassTransit RequestClients default timeout to (2s). Fix RabbitMQ health check (close connection). Add new userId parameter to AccessValidator methods.
      1.1.21 - Change MassTransit RequestClients default timeout to (5s).
      1.1.20 - Add access validator and token auto inject. Add default request timeout (500ms) to MassTransit RequestClients.
      1.1.19 - Rework inject extensions for business ojects and MassTransit RequestClients.
      1.1.18 - Rework auto inject method. Add auto inject for MassTransit RequestClients.
      1.1.17 - Add RabbitMQ health check.
      1.1.16 - Fix ApiInformation middleware. Refactoring configurations models.
      1.1.15 - Create ApiInformation middleware.
      1.1.14 - Remove repository tag from nuspec.
      1.1.13 - Update release notes format.
      1.1.12 - Update copyright and tags.
      1.1.11 - Add BaseApiInfo abstract class for inheritance. Add ApiInfoResponse model.
      1.1.10 - Add auto inject for Commands, Mappers, Validators, Repositories objects.
title: LT.DigitalOffice.Kernel
